titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 50th anniversary of the Federal Executive Boards.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 11/10/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Commemorates the 50th anniversary of the Federal Executive Boards. Commends the Boards for their dedication to the federal community. Encourages federal leaders to continue to support and participate in the activities of the Boards.
